Studying Online is now much easier

ESTIGO is an innovative platform that teaches you in a more interactive way

Get started

All-In-One Learning Platform

ESTIGO is a powerful online platform that brings together all the
essential tools needed to manage a successful educational
experience, from classrooms to administration.

Online Billing,
Invoicing, & Contracts

Simple and secure control of your organization's financial and legal transactions. Send customized invoices and contracts

Easy Scheduling &
Attendance Tracking

Schedule and reserve classrooms at one campus or multiple campuses. Keep detailed records of student attendance

Parent Tracking

Easily automate and track emails to individuals or groups. ESTIGO's integrated system streamlines communication, helping you keep organized and connected.

What is ESTIGO?

Estigo is a platform that allows educators to create online classes whereby they can store the course materials online; manage assignments, quizzes and exams; monitor due dates; grade results and provide students with feedback all in one place.

FOR INSTRUCTORS

FOR STUDENTS

Everything you can achieve in a classroom, you can accomplish with ESTIGO's online courses.

Designed For All
teachersstudentsparentsteachers

  • Teachers can efficiently manage courses and interact with students in a focused environment.

  • Students benefit from engaging resources and recorded lessons tailored to their learning needs.

  • Parents have the ability to monitor their child's academic progress and stay updated on their learning journey.

Tools For Teachers
And Learners

Class has a dynamic set of teaching tools built to
be deployed and used during class. Teachers can
handout assignments in real-time for students to
complete and submit.

Assessments,
Quizzes, Tests

Easily launch live assignments, quizzes, and tests
powered by AI. Student results are automatically
graded and entered into the online grade book,
providing instant feedback and insights.

Wanna stay in contact?
Download our App!

Stay connected with your classroom anytime, anywhere.
Our mobile app lets you manage classes, track attendance,
grade assignments, and communicate with students
right from your phone or tablet.
